name: To The Skies
description:
This is my first ever game.

Player 1 uses a and d to turn left and right and e to shoot.

Player 2 uses arrow keys to turn and space to shoot.

You both start with 0 ammo and each coin will add ten ammo.

Coins will spawn at random points during the game.

If you download on Mac the first time you open it you will have to right click on the app in the finder.

UPDATE!! - only updated for downloadable version(will be on web version as well soon):

Bigger planes

Particle Effect when coin is collected
